title: Japan Miyazaki Beachside Resort Steps from the Sea
description: Steps from the surf and offering soothing ocean and park views, the Holiday Inn Resort ANA Miyazaki, an IHG Hotel is perfect for a seaside escape in sunny Kyushu. Splash in azure waves under the warm sun, and take in stunning coastlines as you drive down to the Udo Shrine to make a wish. On your return, soothe and revitalise your body with a soak in the tranquil onsite onsen or an invigorating massage and indulge in fine sake and traditional Japanese cuisine at Himuka Shizuku.
location_description: ANA Holiday Inn Resort Miyazaki, an IHG Hotel
